{"id":1267658285,"question_id":3434,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"8 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1716652202,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1267658285/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find the Number of Distinct Colors Among the Balls","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    vector<int> queryResults(int limit, vector<vector<int>>& queries) {\n        vector<int> ans(queries.size(), 0);\n\n        unordered_map<int, vector<int>> current_res;  //color, ball1, ball3, ....\n        for(int i=0; i<queries.size(); i++) {\n            vector<int> current_paint = queries[i];\n\n            if(current_res.find(current_paint[1])== current_res.end()) { //current color not found\n                current_res[current_paint[1]].push_back(current_paint[0]);\n                ans[i] = current_res.size();\n            } else { ////current color found\n                vector<int>& balls = current_res[current_paint[1]];\n                for(auto j=balls.begin(); j!=balls.end(); j++) {\n                    if(*j == current_paint[0]) {\n                        balls.erase(j);\n                        break;\n                    }\n\n                }\n                current_res[current_paint[1]].push_back(current_paint[0]);\n                ans[i] = current_res.size();\n            }\n\n        };\n\n        return ans;\n\n        \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-the-number-of-distinct-colors-among-the-balls","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
